dialogs.deleteChats.title: Delete Chats
dialogs.deleteChats.description: Are you sure you want to delete all of your chats? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteChats.error: Deletion of chats was not possible
dialogs.deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
dialogs.deleteAccount.description: This action cannot be undone. Enter your password to confirm.
dialogs.deleteAccount.descriptionWithMFA: This action cannot be undone. Enter your password and MFA code to confirm.
dialogs.deleteAccount.error.passwordRequ: Password is required to delete the account.
dialogs.deleteAccount.error.deletionFail: Deletion of account was not possible.

archivedChats.empty: You don't have any archived chats.

archivedChats.archiveAll.description: Are you sure you want to archive all of your chats?
archivedChats.unarchiveAll.title: Unarchive all chats
archivedChats.unarchiveAll.description: Are you sure you want to unarchive all of your chats?
archivedChats.delete.title: Delete Archived Chat

archivedChats.error.archiveAll: Archival of all chats was not possible.
archivedChats.error.unarchiveAll: Unarchival of all chats was not possible.
